name: biomni-analyze-interaction-mechanisms
title: Biomni: Analyze Interaction Mechanisms
description: Analyzes drug-drug interaction mechanisms for a specific drug pair
content:
Overview

Analyzes drug-drug interaction mechanisms for a specific drug pair, identifying the biological pathways and molecular mechanisms underlying interactions. Provides detailed mechanistic insights for clinical decision-making.

Input Parameters

  • drug_pair (required): Pair of drug names to analyze (e.g., ["Warfarin", "Aspirin"])
  • detailed_analysis (optional): Boolean flag for comprehensive mechanism analysis (default: True)
  • data_lake_path (optional): Path to custom interaction database

Biological Use Case

Critical for understanding the molecular basis of drug-drug interactions, including pharmacokinetic (absorption, metabolism, excretion) and pharmacodynamic (synergistic or antagonistic effects) mechanisms. Supports safer polypharmacy and combination therapy design.

Output

Detailed interaction mechanisms including CYP450 metabolism, transporter interactions, receptor-level effects, and clinical significance saved to interaction_mechanisms_results.txt

Category

pharmacology
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python3 prod_apps/biomni/pharmacology/analyze_interaction_mechanisms.py --drug-pair "${drugPair}" --detailed-analysis "${detailedAnalysis}" ${dataLakePath:+--data-lake-path "${dataLakePath}"} -o "${outputDir}"
